PageDescription: Open, create, convert, edit and collaborate on Office documents within Telegram
OpenCreateConvertEdit: Open, create, convert, edit and collaborate on Office documents within Telegram
DocumentsTab1Label: Create new DOCX, XLSX, and PPTX documents; open local ones
DocumentsTab2Label: Edit and collaborate on your Office documents with other Telegram users
DocumentsTab3Label: Read and edit PDFs, export/import to/from PDF
DocumentsTab4Label: Easily convert documents online. Over 50 formats are supported
FeaturesAIHelper: A robust set of editing, formatting, and styling tools. Enhanced security.
FeaturesCoEditing: <0>Real-time</0> and <0>paragraph-locking</0> co-editing, co-editing, review, version history, document comparison, comments & mentions.
FeaturesFormats: Ondersteuning voor meer dan <0>50 bestandsformaten</0>. Volledig geschikt voor MS Office-formaten: DOCX, XLSX, PPTX.
